February 1977: The Vendetta in Iga

Plays:

The Vendetta in Iga (伊賀越道中双六)

Scenes:

The New Barrier at Fujikawa with Insertion of the Scene of Dumpling Peddlers (富士川新関 引抜き 団子売)

The Bamboo Groove (竹藪)

The Town of Okazaki (岡崎)

Shibagaki (母柴垣)

Otani (娘お谷)
